  • Method Details

    • suggestionInbox

      public void suggestionInbox(CAMs.Staff staff)
      Displays the suggestion inbox for a staff member, including enquiries and suggestions. Allows staff to reply to enquiries and approve suggestions.
      Specified by:
      suggestionInbox in interface CAMs.SuggestionHandler
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member for whom the suggestion inbox is displayed.

    • approveSuggestion

      public void approveSuggestion(CAMs.Suggestion suggestion, CAMs.Staff staff)
      Approves a suggestion, updating related information such as removing it from the staff member's inbox, updating the suggestion status, earning points for the user, and changing the user's status.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion to be approved.
      staff - The staff member approving the suggestion.

    • approveSuggestion

      public void approveSuggestion(CAMs.Suggestion suggestion)
      Approves a suggestion, updating related information such as removing it from the suggestion list for a camp and marking it as approved.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion to be approved.

    • viewSuggestions

      public void viewSuggestions(CAMs.Camp camp)
      Displays the suggestions for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp for which suggestions are displayed.
